Title: Devil's Breath: The World's Scariest Drug #shorts
Description: Uncover the terrifying reality of Devil's Breath, a drug with chilling effects on the human mind. Derived from the Datura plant, this video exposes its use in crimes and its alarming impact on memory and free will. #shorts #awareness

Scenes.VoiceOverText: The scariest drug, Devil's Breath, is a dangerous drug produced from the seeds of Datura SPP, a tropane alkaloid plant.
